Title: This Is the Last Trump Card! Goku's Extra-Large Genki-dama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Plot: When his most powerful attacks fail to faze Frieza, Goku turns to his ultimate weapon: the Spirit Bomb! Piccolo joins the fight to buy Goku some time, but can the noble Namekian survive long enough to taste sweet victory?
